tags.name: luigi-container
tags.description:
### Overview

The `luigi-container` provides the possibility to display a micro frontend in webcomponent.

attributes.name: viewurl
attributes.description: The URL of the microfrontend to be rendered.

attributes.name: defer-init
attributes.description: If set to true defers from initializing the microfronted automatically. In that case init() can be used.

attributes.name: no-shadow
attributes.description: If set to true, the Luigi container webcomponent will not use the shadow DOM for rendering.

attributes.name: context
attributes.description: The stringified context object to be passed to the microfrontend.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Label information for the microfrontend

attributes.name: webcomponent
attributes.description: Predicate that sets whether the microfrontend is to be rendered in a web component or not. Either a stringified boolean or json valid object.

attributes.name: locale
attributes.description: The locale to be passed to the web-component-based micro frontend.

attributes.name: theme
attributes.description: The theme to be passed to the  web-component-based micro frontend.

attributes.name: active-feature-toggle-list
attributes.description: The list of active feature toggles to be passed to the web-component-based micro frontend.

attributes.name: skip-init-check
attributes.description: If set to true, skips handshake and ready event is fired immediately.

attributes.name: node-params
attributes.description: The parameters to be passed to the web-component-based micro frontend. Will not be passed to the compound children.

attributes.name: user-settings
attributes.description: The user settings to be passed to the web-component-based micro frontend.

attributes.name: anchor
attributes.description: The anchor value to be passed to the web-component-based micro frontend.

attributes.name: search-params
attributes.description: The search parameters to be passed to the web-component-based micro frontend.

attributes.name: path-params
attributes.description: The path parameters to be passed to the web-component-based micro frontend.

attributes.name: client-permissions
attributes.description: The clientPermissions to be passed to the web-component-based micro frontend.

attributes.name: dirty-status
attributes.description: The dirty status value to be passed to the web-component-based micro frontend. It's used to indicate that there are unsaved changes when navigating away.

attributes.name: has-back
attributes.description: The hasBack value to be passed to the web-component-based micro frontend. It indicates that there is one or more preserved views. Useful when you need to show a back button.

attributes.name: document-title
attributes.description: The document title value to be passed to the web-component-based micro frontend.

attributes.name: allow-rules
attributes.description: The list of rules for the content in the iframe, managed by the HTML `allow` attribute. You can use one or more rules by adding them to the array, for example allow-rules='["microphone", "camera"]'

attributes.name: sandbox-rules
attributes.description: The list of rules for the content in the iframe, managed by the HTML `sandbox` attribute. You can use one or more rules by adding them to the array, for example sandbox-rules='["allow-scripts", "allow-same-origin"]'

attributes.name: auth-data
attributes.description: The authData value to be passed to the iframe-based micro frontend.

tags.name: luigi-compound-container
tags.description:
### Overview

The `luigi-compound-container` provides the possibility to insert multiple webcomponent-based microfrontends in one container.

attributes.name: viewurl
attributes.description: The URL used for the renderer.

attributes.name: defer-init
attributes.description: If set to true defers from initializing the microfronted automatically. In that case init() can be used.

attributes.name: context
attributes.description: The stringified context to be passed to the compound microfrontend.

attributes.name: no-shadow
attributes.description: If set to true, the Luigi compound container webcomponent will not use the shadow DOM for rendering.

attributes.name: compound-config
attributes.description: The configuration for the compound microfrontend. Take a look at the <a href='https://docs.luigi-project.io/docs/navigation-parameters-reference/?section=compound' for details.

attributes.name: user-settings
attributes.description: The user settings to be passed to the compound micro frontend.

attributes.name: anchor
attributes.description: The anchor value to be passed to the compound micro frontend.

attributes.name: search-params
attributes.description: The search parameters to be passed to the compound micro frontend.

attributes.name: path-params
attributes.description: The path parameters to be passed to the compound micro frontend.

attributes.name: client-permissions
attributes.description: The clientPermissions to be passed to the compound micro frontend.

attributes.name: dirty-status
attributes.description: The dirty status value to be passed to the compound micro frontend. It's used to indicate that there are unsaved changes when navigating away.

attributes.name: has-back
attributes.description: The hasBack value to be passed to the compound micro frontend. It indicates that there is one or more preserved views. Useful when you need to show a back button.

attributes.name: document-title
attributes.description: The document title value to be passed to the compound micro frontend.

attributes.name: skip-init-check
attributes.description: If set to true, skips handshake and ready event is fired immediately.

attributes.name: locale
attributes.description: The locale to be passed to the compound micro frontend.

attributes.name: active-feature-toggle-list
attributes.description: The list of active feature toggles to be passed to the compound microfrontend.

attributes.name: theme
attributes.description: The theme to be passed to the compound microfrontend.
